zone.line: no means of extracting it. a My suffering were
augmented also by the oppressive sense I had
of the injustice & ingratitude ‸ of their infliction My daily vows prayers
rose for revenge — a deep & deadly revenge
such as would alone compensate for the

mod.add: the outrages & the anguish I had endured

zone.line: After some weeks my wound healed
and I continued my journey — the labours
I endured were no longer ‸ to be alleviated by the
bright sun or genttle breezes of spring —
all joy was but a mockery to me, &
made me feel more painfully that
I was not made for enjoyment. But
my journey toils now drew near a close & two
months from this time I reached the

environs of Geneva. 1st encoder sees doodle or sketch; QC sees tiny ink pattern above tail of terminal "a" in "Geneva," then an up-sweeping pen stroke from below at line's end delineating text from subsequent lines
the same
chapter
continued
which insul
ted my desolate
state, &
